title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
arch for Grand Duke Ravengard in the city.

Grand Duke Ravengard is gone from Gortash's audience chamber. His whereabouts are currently unknown. We should search the city for signs of the duke.

While you are in the city, you will need to progress through the Main Quests and get through Get Gortash's Netherstone. Until you witness his ceremony. You will find him by Gortash as he is crowned the new archduke. This will update the journals for Rescue the Grand Duke. After this event, speak to Mizor
